LightningComponentBundle.description: Page header with company/division info and customizable action buttons for Flow navigation

property.name: actionLinks
property.label: Action Links (JSON)
property.description: JSON array for custom actions only. Options: 1) pageReference for Navigation mixin, 2) url string (opens in new tab if target:'_blank'), 3) actionClicked output for custom logic, 4) visible:true/false for conditional display. Standard Next/Previous buttons use checkboxes below. Example: [{"label":"Help","name":"help","url":"https://help.com","target":"_blank"}]

property.name: maxVisibleActions
property.label: Max Visible Actions
property.description: Maximum number of actions to show as buttons. Additional actions appear in overflow menu. Ignored if Custom Actions In Dropdown is enabled.

property.name: customActionsInDropdown
property.label: Custom Actions In Dropdown
property.description: When enabled, only Previous/Next buttons show as visible buttons. All custom actions appear in overflow dropdown menu.

property.name: showNext
property.label: Show Next/Finish Button
property.description: Shows Next/Finish button. Label auto-detected based on Flow position, or use Next Button Label to override.

property.name: nextLabel
property.label: Next/Finish Button Label
property.description: Custom label for Next/Finish button. Leave blank for auto-detection (Next/Finish based on Flow position).

property.name: nextVariant
property.label: Next/Finish Button Variant
property.description: Button style variant for Next/Finish button.

property.name: showPrevious
property.label: Show Previous Button
property.description: Shows Previous button. Use Previous Button Label to override default 'Previous' text.

property.name: previousLabel
property.label: Previous Button Label
property.description: Custom label for Previous button. Leave blank to use 'Previous'.

property.name: previousVariant
property.label: Previous Button Variant
property.description: Button style variant for Previous button.

property.name: useCustomTitle
property.label: Custom Title/Meta?
property.description: When true, use the provided custom title and meta and skip fetching Rootstock data.

property.name: pageTitleInput
property.label: Custom Page Title
property.description: Custom title to show when Use custom title/meta = true.

property.name: pageMetaInput
property.label: Custom Page Meta
property.description: Custom meta line to show when Use custom title/meta = true.

property.name: actionClicked
property.label: Action Clicked
property.description: Output: Name of action clicked (only for custom actions without navigate/url/pageReference). Use in Decision to route Flow.
